text: [Music]
behind me it's the body center that is
an example of wearable robot that we
developed here and it is a device that
is able to track the movement the
complex movement of the the body the
human body and also to amplify the force
of the user
so this is the body extender we
developed here at Parker it is a fully
activated full-body exoskeleton and it
has a total of 22 degrees of freedom
that are all actuated with an electric
motor this is the arm this is the pro no
supination of the forearm and finally we
have the gripper so the the body
extender is able to lift 50 kilograms
for each hand with our full extent there
are several possible application of the
body extender for example if you have to
assembly complete product lier an
aircraft for example this is a machine
that is very flexible from this point of
view you can lift the panel rotate it
and position it in the right position
another application of the body extender
is the rescue of victims in case of an
earthquake so you need something that is
very flexible in order to intervene
rapidly without damaging the weakness
